title: Prof.OAK
description:
"Welcome to Pokemon Tiles! 
 One the biggest board game in the world of Pokemon!"

title: Prof.OAK
description: "The annual PokeTile Tournament is about to begin and everyone can participate!"

title: Prof.OAK
description: "Explore some mysterious places and fight other Poketile Masters. You should try, it will be a good experience!"

title: Prof.OAK
description: "But first, are you a boy or a girl?"

title: Prof.OAK
description:
While you are here, I can register you. 
 What is your name?

title: Prof.OAK
description: Before letting you start your incredible journey, I will train you a bit with the the help of other professors.

title: Prof.OAK
description: Find us in the "Lab" and try to complete each tutorial session. You can't be lost, there is only one way to go. Good Luck!
